profile.name: Feross Aboukhadijeh
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | @SocketDev, @WebTorrent, @Standard
profile.summary: Highly skilled software engineer with expertise in JavaScript and TypeScript. Passionate about exploring new libraries and tools to improve developer productivity.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the development of Signal-Desktop using TypeScript and WebRTC.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate new features and improve overall performance.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple utility libraries and tools, including run-series, speakeasyjs.com, simple-get, git-pull-or-clone, safe-buffer, thanks, simple-sha256, yt-player, drag-drop, hyperscript-attribute-to-property, queue-microtask, TheAnnoyingSite.com, chrome-dgram, chrome-net, timidity, cross-zip, arch, express-sitemap-xml, simple-peer, connectivity, bitmidi.com
Maintained and updated open-source projects, including Signal-Desktop.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of various utility libraries and tools.
Ensured code quality, security, and maintainability.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple projects using JavaScript and Node.js.
Collaborated with clients to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
